column5: DOES ANYONE HAVE THE WEB SITE FOR TAKINGTHE TEST ON LINE THAT IS NOW REQUIRED TO OPERATE A BOAT IN CANADIAN WATERS. I HAD IT HOWEVER MISPLACED IT... THANKS

Where do you live? If you live in Canada you need to take the test. If you live in USA & are bringing a private boat, you need to take the test only if your going to be in CANADA FOR 45 DAYS. If you are using a resort boat, the resort owner should review a safety list with you and have you sign a form & carry it with you that that will qualify, so then you don't need to take the test. Happy fishing!
